original_title: Police disperse IUSF protest in Punchi Borella
original_body_lines: Colombo, March 6 (Daily Mirror) -Police used water cannons to disperse a group of students participating in a protest march organized by the Inter-University Students' Federation at Punchi Borella.
Two students, including the convener of the Inter-University Students' Federation Madhushan Chandrajit, have been arrested.
